subject: Re: [junit] Junit logger
msgSnippet: Hi, Can you elaborate on what kind of info you need to add? Thanks. Bill On Tue, Jun 14, 2011 at 12:43 AM, turturiellomartino
messageBody:
Hi,

Thanks.
